resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103033</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103033</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206446</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water: From Neglect to Respect</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser: Zu respektieren von der 
Vernachlässigung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau : De la négligence à respecter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água: Da negligência a respeitar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua: Da negligenza da rispettare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύδωρ: Από την παραμέληση στο σεβασμό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agua: De la negligencia a respetar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students use graphing, estimating, and writing skills to discover the ways they are dependent upon water to maintain their standard of living.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">der Hilfen Kursteilnehmergebrauch, der 
Fähigkeiten, um die Methoden zu entdecken sind sie graphisch 
darstellt, schätzt und schreibt, nach Wasser abhängig, ihren 
Standard des Lebens beizubehalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">utilisation d'étudiants d'aides représentant 
graphiquement, estimant, et écrivant des qualifications pour 
découvrir les voies elles dépendent de l'eau pour mettre à jour 
leur niveau la vie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uso dos estudantes das ajudas que representa 
graficamente, estimando, e escrevendo habilidades para descobrir as 
maneiras são dependentes da água manter seu padrão de viver.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">uso degli allievi di aiuti che rappresenta 
graficamente, valutante e scrivente le abilità per scoprire i modi 
dipendono da acqua effettuare il loro livello of vivere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρήση σπουδαστών οδηγιών που δίνει με γραφική 
παράσταση, που υπολογίζει, και δεξιότητα σύνταξης εγγράφου για να
ανακαλύψει τους τρόπους που εξαρτώνται από το ύδωρ για να 
διατηρήσουν το βιοτικό επίπεδό τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">uso de los estudiantes de las ayudas que 
representa, estimando, y escribiendo habilidades gra'ficamente para 
descubrir las maneras son dependientes sobre el agua mantener su 
estándar vivir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206446</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103033</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/water-from-neglect-to-respect</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
